description: Unlinks a DeveloperUserIdentifier from an existing identity. Unlinked developer users will be considered new identities next time they are seen. If, for a given Cognito identity, you remove all federated identities as well as the developer user identifier, the Cognito identity becomes inaccessible. You must use Amazon Web Services developer credentials to call this operation.

parameters.name: IdentityId
parameters.description: A unique identifier in the format REGION:GUID.

parameters.name: IdentityPoolId
parameters.description: An identity pool ID in the format REGION:GUID.

parameters.name: DeveloperProviderName
parameters.description: The 'domain' by which Cognito will refer to your users.

parameters.name: DeveloperUserIdentifier
parameters.description: A unique ID used by your backend authentication process to identify a user.
